scripts.dev: npm run db:start && mcp-inspector nodemon -q --watch src --exec node ./src/server.ts
scripts.db:start: docker compose up -d && npm run db:wait && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && npm run db:start
scripts.db:wait: for i in {1..30}; do curl -s http://localhost:8124/ > /dev/null 2>&1 && break || sleep 1; done
scripts.db:seed: CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost CLICKHOUSE_PORT=8124 CLICKHOUSE_USERNAME=gram_user CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD=gram_password CLICKHOUSE_DATABASE=gram_example node --import tsx scripts/seed.ts
